name: extend
title: extend.ai
shortDescription: Extend is designed to transform document processing using large language models (LLMs), offering state-of-the-art accuracy and reliability. It is ideal for technical teams facing complex document challenges. By leveraging Extend, companies can quickly turn varied document types, including those with tables, signatures, and images, into high-quality data. This tool is particularly useful in scenarios where traditional OCR fails, such as processing degraded scans or intricate layouts.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: ABBYY FlexiCapture
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Advanced OCR and form processing capabilities
